Name: Climb It
About the game: Climb It is a platformer and a puzzle game. In Climb It you play as a bouncing ball. Your goal is to advance in a world divided in multiple areas. Each area is inspired by an old arcade game and contains levels to find. GAMEPLAY Exploration Advance in a 2D world full of obstacles. Be skilful and go from area to area. Find all hidden levels in the world. Levels Once you are in a level you have to collect all bricks without dying to finish the level. Use your brain and get those bricks by all means ! CHALLENGE If you like a challenge this game is made for you. The sadistic level design will complicate things (No refund for broken mouses). But don’t worry, with enough motivation and focus you will succeed ! Key features : 1 Tutorial - A first area to learn the controls and to understand the game mechanics. 2 Zones - Each one add it's own touch to the gameplay. 60+ Niveaux - Find and finish them. 1 Boss - If you go so far... 4 à 6 Heures - To finish the game.
